Package org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.springtools.configuration.oauth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserServiceProxy
    Feign proxy for User service
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BusConfiguration
    This configuration class registers all custom events from specified basePackages with Spring Cloud Bus.
    OAuth2FeignRequestInterceptor
    Feign interceptor used to add OAuth2 authentication to http headers :
    OAuth2GenericConfiguration
    Common configuration (MVC and Webflux)
    OAuth2JwtProcessingUtilities
    Some share utilities
    OAuth2ReactiveConfiguration
    Authentication configuration for webflux
    OpFabJwtAuthenticationToken
    Custom OperatorFabric Jwt Authentication Token whose custom principal is a User object
    UpdatedUserEvent
    Custom event fired by users-business-service when a user is updated.
    UpdateUserEventListener
    Listens for UpdatedUserEvent to clear user cache for a given user.
    UserServiceCache
    This class is responsible for retrieving User information either from cache or from the UserServiceProxy, as well as clearing the cache on request.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EnableOperatorFabricOAuth2
    Enable OperatorFabric Oauth configuration for Spring MVC
    EnableReactiveOperatorFabricOAuth2
    Enable OperatorFabric Oauth configuration for Spring Webflux
